system.hpIncrease: Gain another hit die for every 1 additional size above 1.
system.attributeIncrease: Low Strength if at least size 1. Normal Strength if at least size 2. Beastly Strength if at least size 4. Improved Strength if at least size 5.

overview.base: Your mouth counts as a weapon for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with it and its damage die is now [[/roll 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/roll 1d8]].

overview.base: You move on a distance up to your movement speed on the ground. If you have a fly speed or swim speed then you may move in the air or in water accordingly. This movement doesn't trigger reactive abilities.

system.trigger: You attack another creature.

overview.base: You become hidden. As you do this, you may roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk]]. If this is greater than your passive sneak ([[/roll 10 + @snk]]), then you use it as your hidden DC. If not, use your passive sneak.
overview.proficient: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @p]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your passive sneak).
overview.fluent: Instead roll [[/roll 1d20 + @snk + @f]] for your hidden DC (if it's greater than your passive sneak).

system.requirements: You are in a location with shadows, dim light, three-quarters cover, or some other feature which the GM determines is appropriate for being hidden. You must remain in areas that maintain these conditions to stay hidden.

overview.base: You vertically leap at quarter speed and horizontally leap at half speed.
overview.proficient: You instead vertically leap at half speed and horizontally leap at full speed.

overview.base: You cannot use items in your hands.
You have Swimming and Diving but have no walk speed.
You swim at full speed.
You no longer have to stay on the surface of water while Swimming.
